text.description:
In this video, we'll take you to 5 hidden gems where locals go. 👉 READ THIS: Since June 2022 the Paris Travel Guide download is NO LONGER FREE. We had to charge a small fee so we can focus on making videos for the channel. We hope the small price is okay with you. Thanks for watching and for your support 😁
=== 🔥 NEW 2023 TRAVEL & FOODIE ONLINE GUIDES 🔥 === GET YOUR OWN Paris Travel Guide 👉 https://bit.ly/LesFrenchiesParisTravelGuides
RECOMMENDED GUIDED TOURS in PARIS 👉 https://bit.ly/RecommendedParisGuidedTours
RECOMMENDED & CURATED ACTIVITIES (VIATOR) 👉 https://bit.ly/RecommendedParisViatorActivities
RECOMMENDED & CURATED ACTIVITIES (GET YOUR GUIDE) 👉 https://bit.ly/RecommendedGetYourGuideActivities
RECOMMENDED & CURATED CLASSES & WORKSHOPS 👉 https://bit.ly/RecommendedClassesWorkshops
RECOMMENDED DAY TRIPS FROM PARIS 👉 https://bit.ly/RecommendedParisDayTrips
RECOMMENDED DAY TRIP TO CHAMPAGNE (PRIVATE VIP) 👉 https://bit.ly/VIPDayTripToChampagneFromParis
RECOMMENDED DAY TRIP TO NORMANDY (PRIVATE VIP) 👉 https://bit.ly/PrivateNormandyToursFromParis
TOP RECOMMENDED DAY TRIPS FROM PARIS (PRIVATE DRIVER) 👉 https://bit.ly/VIPDayTripsFromParis
BOOK YOUR PARIS AIRPORT TRANSFERS (PRIVATE DRIVER) 👉 https://bit.ly/RecommendedParisAirportTransfers
GET YOUR ANTI-THEFT TRAVEL GEAR 👉 https://geni.us/AntiTheftTravelGear
📍 Chez Germaine https://bit.ly/ChezGermaine
📍 Chez Savy https://bit.ly/ChezSavyParis
📍 Le Bistrot de Paris https://bit.ly/BistrotDeParisStGermain
📍 Le Petit Vendôme https://bit.ly/PetitVendome
📍 Chez René https://bit.ly/ChezRene
#lesfrenchiestravel
==== OTHER WAYS TO CONNECT WITH LES FRENCHIES ==== https://lesfrenchiestravel.com/ For Questions & Personal Inquiries: https://www.facebook.com/groups/248615420946312 https://www.instagram.com/lesfrenchiestravel For Business Inquiries ONLY: lesfrenchiestravel@gmail.com
As you can imagine, we're on the go most of the time. So it may take us a little bit of time to get back to you and respond. Just be patient, we're doing our best to get back to everybody 😁
==== DISCLAIMERS ==== ⚖️ All clips used for fair use commentary, criticism, and educational purposes. See Hosseinzadeh v. Klein, 276 F.Supp.3d 34 (S.D.N.Y. 2017); Equals Three, LLC v. Jukin Media, Inc., 139 F. Supp. 3d 1094 (C.D. Cal. 2015). Almost all, if not 100% of the clips are sourced via an active royalty-free license agreement with Storyblocks. (https://www.storyblocks.com/)
In compliance with the FTC guidelines, please understand the following about some of the links in the description : 📌 A few links on our channel's description are affiliate links of which we receive a small commission from sales of certain items, but the price is the same for you. 📌 If we post an affiliate link to a product or service, it is something that we personally use, support, and would recommend even without an affiliate link. 📌 Our first priority is always providing valuable information and resources to help you create positive experiences during your visit to France, and we will only ever link to products or resources (affiliate or otherwise) that fit within this purpose. 📌 We do not accept money from vendors to showcase their products or services. Often time, we pay for them out of pocket. 📌 Finally, the small commission we earn helps us create more videos like the one you watched.
© 2022 Les Frenchies Travel. All rights reserved.
text.fulltitle: 5 Best Restaurants & Bistros in Paris (Where Locals Eat)
text.tags: restaurants in paris where locals eat; best paris restaurants; best restaurants in paris; what to eat in paris; paris restaurants guide; paris restaurants where locals eat; what to eat in paris france; paris restaurants; les frenchies; where to eat in paris; best food in paris; restaurants to try in paris; paris restaurant guide; best food paris; restaurants in paris; paris food tour; les frenchies travel; paris travel tips; things to do in paris; Paris travel guide;
text.title: 5 Best Restaurants & Bistros in Paris (Where Locals Eat)
text.p: there are thousands of restaurants
